channel.title: SMF 113 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 113 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: SMF 113 Subtype 1
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF113SDS SMF113SSS SMF113ID SMF113_1_CTR SMF113_1_CSS SMF113_1_SCDS SMF113_1_LCDS Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp time date Record Time Stamp interval intervalstart intervalend The interval time delta Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format flg flag SMF113FLG Header flag byte string sbt flg Bit 1 - Subtypes utilized ssf flg Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID rty SMF113RTY Record type - 113 (‘71’x) integer date SMF113DTE Date of Record date time SMF113TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual time

item.title: SMF 113 Subtype 2
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF113SDS SMF113SSS SMF113ID SMF113_2_CTR SMF113_2_CSS SMF113_2_CDS Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp time date Record Time Stamp interval intervalstart intervalend The interval time delta Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format flg flag SMF113FLG Header flag byte string sbt flg Bit 1 - Subtypes utilized ssf flg Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID rty SMF113RTY Record type - 113 (‘71’x) integer date SMF113DTE Date of Record date time SMF113TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual time

item.title: Field - cdln
item.description: Length of counter data section Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CDLN

item.title: Field - cdln
item.description: Length of counter data sections Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CDLN

item.title: Field - cdof
item.description: Offset to counter data section for this counter set, from the beginnin… Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CDOF Description Offset to counter data section for this counter set, from the beginning of record. This can be to a SMF113_1_SCDS section or a SMF113_1_LCDS section, depending SMF113_1_CSUseLCDS

item.title: Field - cdof
item.description: Offset to counter data section from beginning of record Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CDOF

item.title: Field - cdon
item.description: Number of counter data sections Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CDON

item.title: Field - cdon
item.description: Number of counter data sections. This is the total number of SMF113_2_… Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CDON Description Number of counter data sections. This is the total number of SMF113_2_CDS sections for all the counter sets

item.title: Field - cf
item.description: Record flags Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CF

item.title: Field - coreid
item.description: Core ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that… Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_COREID Description Core ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid core ID number.

item.title: Field - cpsp
item.description: Processor speed for which the event counters are recorded. Speed is in… Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CPSP Description Processor speed for which the event counters are recorded. Speed is in cycles/microsecond.

item.title: Field - cpu_num
item.description: Processor number for which the event counters are recorded. Note that … Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CPU# Description Processor number for which the event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid processor number. This field is deprecated, use SMF113_2_CpuId instead.

item.title: Field - cpuid
item.description: Processor ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note… Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CPUID Description Processor ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid processor number.

item.title: Field - cpuid
item.description: Processor ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note … Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CPUID Description Processor ID for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Note that zero is a valid processor ID.

item.title: Field - cpuprocclass
item.description: The processor type for which the hardware event counters are recorded…. Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CPUPROCCLASS Description The processor type for which the hardware event counters are recorded. Will be one of the following: 0 = Standard CP 2 = zCBP or zAAP see SMF113_1_zCBP 4 = zIIP

item.title: Field - cpuprocclass
item.description: The processor type for which the event counters are recorded. Will be … Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CPUPROCCLASS Description The processor type for which the event counters are recorded. Will be one of the following: 0 = Standard CP 2 = zCBP or zAAP see SMF113_2_zCBP 4 = zIIP

item.title: Field - cpuspeed
item.description: Processor speed for which the event counters are recorded. Speed is in… Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CPUSPEED Description Processor speed for which the event counters are recorded. Speed is in cycles/microsecond.

item.title: Field - cr
item.description: Hardware event counter value. Contains the absolute number of times a… Map: SMF113_2_CDS Based on: SMF113_2_CR Description Hardware event counter value. Contains the absolute number of times a particular hardware counter event has occurred.

Field - csln

item.description: Offset to counter set section from beginning of record Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CSOF

item.description: Number of counter set sections Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CSON

item.title: Field - cson
item.description: Number of counter set sections Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CSON

item.title: Field - cst
item.description: Counterset type for counters recorded in SMF113_2_CR: 1 = Basic, 2 = P… Map: SMF113_2_CSS Based on: SMF113_2_CST Description Counterset type for counters recorded in SMF113_2_CR: 1 = Basic, 2 = Problem state, 3 = Crypto-activity, 4 = Extended

item.title: Field - cstype
item.description: Counter set type for counters recorded: 1 = Basic, 2 = Problem state, … Map: SMF113_1_CSS Based on: SMF113_1_CSTYPE Description Counter set type for counters recorded: 1 = Basic, 2 = Problem state, 3 = Crypto-activity, 4 = Extended 5 = z/OS 6 = MT-diagnostic

item.title: Field - csuselcds
Field - ctm
item.description: Time when this SMF record is written – STCK format Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTM

item.title: Field - ctm
item.description: Time when this SMF record is written – STCK format Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CTM

item.title: Field - ctrversion0
item.description: Zero counter version number. This number is incremented when there is… Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTRVERSION0 Description Zero counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter in the z/OS counter set

item.title: Field - ctrversion1
item.description: First counter version number. This number is incremented when there is… Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTRVERSION1 Description First counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Basic or Problem-state counter sets

item.title: Field - ctrversion2
item.description: Second counter version number. This number is incremented when there i… Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_CTRVERSION2 Description Second counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Crypto-activity, Extended or MT-diagnostic counters

item.title: Field - ctrvn1
item.description: First counter version number. This number is incremented when there is… Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CTRVN1 Description First counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Basic or Problem-state counter sets

item.title: Field - ctrvn2
item.description: Second counter version number. This number is incremented when there i… Map: SMF113_2_CTR Based on: SMF113_2_CTRVN2 Description Second counter version number. This number is incremented when there is a change to the meaning of a counter or the number of installed counters in the Crypto-activity or Extended counter sets

item.title: Field - flags
item.description: No description available Map: SMF113_1_CTR Based on: SMF113_1_FLAGS

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: Header flag byte Record: SMF113S1 Based on: SMF113FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description sbt 1 Bit 1 - Subtypes utilized ssf 0 Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: Header flag byte Record: SMF113S2 Based on: SMF113FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description sbt 1 Bit 1 - Subtypes utilized ssf 0 Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID

item.description: Length of identification section Map: SMF113SDS Based on: SMF113ILN

item.title: Field - interval
item.description: The interval time delta Map: SMF113ID Based on: intervalstart, intervalend Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return intervalend - intervalstart

item.title: Field - interval
item.description: The interval time delta Map: SMF113ID Based on: intervalstart, intervalend Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return intervalend - intervalstart

item.title: Field - lcr
item.description: Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular c… Map: SMF113_1_LCDS Based on: SMF113_1_LCR Description Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular counter event has occurred since either the start of the HIS collection run, or the previous SMF 113 Type 1 record.

item.description: Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular c… Map: SMF113_1_SCDS Based on: SMF113_1_SCR Description Event counter value delta. Contains the number of times a particular counter event has occurred since either the start of the HIS collection run, or the previous SMF 113 Type 1 record.

item.title: Field - ssf
item.description: Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID Record: SMF113S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.description: Bit 0 - Subsys ID after Sys ID Record: SMF113S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Time Stamp Record: SMF113S1 Based on: time, date Description Timestamp from SMF data. Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Time Stamp Record: SMF113S2 Based on: time, date Description Timestamp from SMF data. Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.
